Utterance: Dekha hoyeche bhalo lagche abar. Last week amra anxiety niye kotha bolchilam. Tomar diary card ta ache?
Ha, ache.
Okay, cholo ektu dekhi taratari. Ekhane ene dekho.
Ha.
Okay, so anxiety onek beshi high. Ki holo gato kal je anxiety eto high chilo, ektu quickly bolte paro?
Anxiety toh always onek high thake. Kintu gato kal chilo worst.
Keno?
Amra gari chalacchi chilam. Baba chalacchen ar ami passenger seat e chilam, ar onek traffic chilo, ar ami jani, eta amake nervous kore. Ami punctual thakte chai.
Jani.

Ami late hote chai na, karon late hole ki jani ki trouble hobe. Tai already ekta edge e chilam. Ar tarpor amra ekta accident dekhlam, mone holo setai chilo traffic er karon. Dui gari chilo, ekdom accordion er moto jure jure, ar ekta tarp. Ar ami jani tarp er niche chilo ekta dead body, ar gari ta right diye chole gelo.
Eta scary.
Eta horrible.
Eta number ta explain kore. Hmm?
Ha. Ke na hobe anxious? Eta toh normal jinish, karon dead body chilo.
Ha, ami o anxious hobo. Ar eta dekha scary. Ar tumi ar ki vabcho jokhon eta dekhecho?
Ke chalabe gari jokhon dui gari accordion er moto jure jure ar ekta dead body? Eta insane. Chalate gele insane hoye jete hobe.
Ar tomar family chay je tumi ei bochhor e driving shikho, karon tumi 16.
Tader matha kharap.
Ar tumi toh bar bar complain koro je tumi thako ekdom nowhere e. Ar jodi gari thakto, tumi friends der dekhte parbe beshi, lame Old Town theke berote parbe, fun things korte parbe.
Ami friends der dekhte parbo na jodi ami dead hoye jai.

True. Eta true. Ar ami o tomay dekhte parbo na. Karon tumi dead. Tumi jano, ami dead manush der treat kori na. Mone acho? Ha, okay. So ek dike, ami jani driving er idea overwhelming. Ar ami jani tumi anxious, sob somoy.
Ar ami bujhte pari je ami drive korte hobe, karon tumi thik bolo. Eta middle of nowhere. Ar ami just, na jete pari na jayga gulo te, kintu...

Tai ami vabchi, amra ki anxiety reduce korar kichu kotha bolte pari. Maybe eta ekta idea hote pare tomay driver's seat e boste sahajyo korte. Ki mone hoy? Mooloto, tumi practice korcho driver's seat e boste, treatment er maddhome, ar anxiety ke tomay control na korte deya, tumi driver's seat e control korcho. Karon eta tumi korchona. Ki mone hoy?
Eta onek pun, Jen.

Ami pun korchi, tai na? So, ekta idea. Cholo start kori. Amra anxiety treat kori. Amra khub bhalo kore kaj kori. Ar idea driving ta maybe eto scary na hobe. Ar mone rakhoni, anxious driver hole accident er risk beshi.
Eta helpful. Dhanyabad.
So tumar anxiety reduce kora, tumake ekta safer driver banabe.
Ha, kintu tumi je sob kichu bolcho ami korle less anxious hobo, seta involve kore feeling really anxious.
True.
Eta ki kore hobe? Tumi bolcho just make it go away. Tumi bolcho na worse kore better koro.
So etar interesting part holo, tumi really good at being really anxious. So tumi eita o khub bhalo korte parbe. Ar eta chole jabe. Ami promise kori, ami totally promise kori.
Eta khub hard.
Jani, well done, ami ekhane expert anxiety treat korar, ar ami promise kori eta better hobe. Ami sab kichu jani. Ami eta jani. Ki mone hoy?
Mone hoy eta khub hard. Eta khub hard.
Ami korbo, totally, totally hard.
Maybe eta just na thak. Same thing je tumi bolo more anxious hote hobe less anxious hote.
Jani. Eta pretty insane, tai na? Ami agree kori. Well, onno option holo tumi just anxious thako baki jibon. Tumar jayga te bus service achi?
Na, tumi jano.

Tomar baki jibon tomar parents er sathe thako. Jani ami bhule gechilam. So tumi tomar parents er sathe thako baki jibon. Karon tumi town chere berote eto anxious je tumi drive korte parbe na. So tumi just tomar parents er sathe thako, anxious hoye thako shob somoy, ar bari jao, so ideas niye kotha bolo kivabe tomar anxiety maintain koro baki jibon. Tumi drive shikhar dorkar hobe na. I mean, tomar parents besh bhalo. Tader probably gari chalate hobe tomar jonno baki jibon, jani na, ora mara jaoar age. Ei byapare ki bhabo? So forget the whole treatment. Ami maybe tomay beshi push korchi. Keno na amra just kotha boli kivabe tomar anxiety maintain koro? Tumi eita te bhalo.
Jenna, eta mone hoy funny na.
Eta funny howar jonno meant kora hoini. Tumi ki mone koro?
eta horrible,

Ami sotti tomay help korte chai. Jani shob somoy anxious thaka khub hard. So ekta option holo khub bhalo hoye jao anxious thakar moddhe, ar okay hote shikho, shikho tomay anxiety niye boshe thakte. Ar arek option holo, ha, beshi anxious hoye anxiety komano.
So tumi bolcho je ami je kichu choose korbo, seta involve korbe anxious feel kora.
Ha. Tomar practice er jonno.
Well, I mean, jodi oi dutoi option hoy, might as well ami je option ta nebo je eventually eta chole jabe, na je shudhu thakbe forever.
